languages.text: "Лорд-капитан и господин Эдельтрад фон Валанциус беседуют на смотровой площадке. Давайте присоединимся к ним".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан и господин Эдельтрад фон Валанциус беседуют на смотровой площадке, расположенной во флигеле офицерской палубы. Давайте присоединимся к ним — я сопровожу вас".

languages.text: "The Lord Captain and Master Edelthrad von Valancius are conversing on the observation platform. Let us join them there."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан и господин Эдельтрад фон Валанциус беседуют на смотровой площадке. Давайте присоединимся к ним".

traits.locale_text: "The Lord Captain and Master Edelthrad von Valancius are having a conversation on the observation platform located in the one of the wings of the officers' deck. Let us join them there. I will accompany you."

"The Lord Captain and Master Edelthrad von Valancius are having a conversation on the observation platform located in the one of the wings of the officers' deck. Let us join them there. I will accompany you."
"The Lord Captain and Master Edelthrad von Valancius are conversing on the observation platform located in one of the wings of the officers' deck. Let us join them there. I shall accompany you."
"The Lord Captain and Master Edelthrad von Valancius are conversing on the observation platform located in one of the wings of the officers' deck. Let us join them there. I shall accompany you."
"The Lord Captain and Master Edelthrad von Valancius are conversing on the observation platform. Let us join them there."

languages.text: “舰长大人正与艾德萨德·冯·瓦兰修斯大师在观景台上谈话，我们一起来加入这场谈话吧。”
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain and Master Edelthrad von Valancius are conversing on the observation platform. Let us join them there."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人正与艾德萨德·冯·瓦兰修斯大师在观景台上谈话。让我们加入他们的行列吧，我会陪您一起过去。”

languages.text: «La Lord Capitán y el maestro Edelthrad von Valancius están charlando en la plataforma de observación. Reunámonos allí con ellos».
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain and Master Edelthrad von Valancius are conversing on the observation platform. Let us join them there."

traits.locale_text: «La Lord Capitán y el maestro Edelthrad von Valancius están charlando en la plataforma de observación. Reunámonos allí con ellos. L{mf|e|a} acompañaré».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテンとエデルスラド・フォン・ヴァランシウス殿下が展望台で話し合っています。私たちもそこに参加しましょう」
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain and Master Edelthrad von Valancius are conversing on the observation platform. Let us join them there."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテンとエデルスラド・フォン・ヴァランシウス殿下が展望台で話し合っています。私たちもそこに参加しましょう。私も同行させていただきます」
「ロード・キャプテンとエデルスラド・フォン・ヴァランシウス殿下が展望台で話し合っています。私たちもそこに参加しましょう」

languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain and Master Edelthrad von Valancius are conversing on the observation platform. Let us join them there."

languages.text: « La seigneure-capitaine et maître Edelthrad von Valancius s'entretiennent sur la plateforme d'observation. Rejoignons-les. »
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain and Master Edelthrad von Valancius are conversing on the observation platform. Let us join them there."

traits.locale_text: « La seigneure-capitaine et maître Edelthrad von Valancius s'entretiennent sur la plateforme d'observation. Rejoignons-les. Je vous accompagne. »

languages.text: "Der Lord Captain und Herr Edelthrad von Valancius haben aktuell eine Besprechung auf der Aussichtsplattform. Stoßen wir zu ihnen."
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain and Master Edelthrad von Valancius are conversing on the observation platform. Let us join them there."

traits.locale_text: "Der Lord Captain und Herr Edelthrad von Valancius haben aktuell eine Besprechung auf der Aussichtsplattform. Stoßen wir zu ihnen. Ich begleite Euch."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan ve Üstat Edelthrad von Valancius, gözlem platformunda görüşüyorlar. Gelin onlara katılalım."
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain and Master Edelthrad von Valancius are conversing on the observation platform. Let us join them there."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan ve Üstat Edelthrad von Valancius, gözlem platformunda görüşüyorlar. Gelin onlara katılalım."
